PageTitle: fragment enable (VPLS Mac ping test instance)
FuncDef:
The fragment enable command enables MPLS packet fragmentation for an NQA VPLS MAC ping test instance.
The undo fragment enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, MPLS packet fragmentation is disabled for NQA test instances.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the MPLS packet length of an NQA test instance is greater than the MTU of a specified MPLS tunnel, MPLS packets fail to pass through the tunnel. To allow the packets to pass through the tunnel, run the fragment enable command to enable MPLS packet fragmentation.
